## IScopedClusterClient.asInternalUser property

A [client](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.opensearchclient.md) to be used to query the opensearch cluster on behalf of the internal OpenSearchDashboards user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly asInternalUser: OpenSearchClient;
```
